CustomField.description: **Conditionally Required** The quantity (number of units) of the item related to the sales order line. Required when an Item is linked that does not have "Disable Price Rules" checked. Default 1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **Conditionally Required** The quantity (number of units) of the item related to the sales order line. Required when an Item is linked that does not have "Disable Price Rules" checked. Default 1.
CustomField.label: Quantity
